price: 43. Tanu waa Jahannamadii ay beeniyeen denbiilayaashu.
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
